qas.question: What spirit did Dominic give to his followers?

answers.text: to assist those searching for the truth

qas.question: Where did Dominic want his followers to look for truth?
What type of man was Dominic?
What was not evidenced throughout all the branches of the order?

plausible_answers.text: the spirit and intentions of its founder

qas.question: What did the spirituality not reflect?

plausible_answers.text: to assist those searching for the truth

qas.question: What spirit did Dominic not give to his followers?
What type of man was Dominic not?
What did Dominic not fully utilize?

context: The <b3_0>spirituality<b3_0/> evidenced throughout all of the branches of the order reflects <b4_0>the spirit and intentions of its founder<b4_0/>, though some of the elements of what later developed might have surprised the Castilian friar. Fundamentally, Dominic was "... <a2_0><b6_0>a man of prayer<b6_0/><a2_0/> who utilized the full <b7_0>resources of the learning<b7_0/> available to him to preach, to teach, and even materially <a0_0><b5_0>to assist those searching for the truth<b5_0/><a0_0/> found in the <a1_0>gospel of Christ<a1_0/>. It is that spirit which [Dominic] bequeathed to his followers".
